page.title: 02ATTITUDES_LOCAL SHOPPING
page.content: As part of our survey of the shopping centre,we interviewed some of the people who were shopping in Perranporth during the morning of June 12th,1985.Here are the questions we asked with the kind of response we had. 1.How often do you come to the shopping centre?{Most came 3/4 times a {week. 2.What is your opinion of the centre? {Most felt it was good to average. 3.Which way did you come to the centre?{Half the people came by car {half had walked. 4.Are there any facilities missing in the centre?{A number pointed out the {lack of any shoe shop,or shoe repair {shop.Others suggested the centre {needed a large supermarket. Results analysed by Class 3J. { }
